fr.sii.ogham.core.service

Class EverySupportingMessagingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.service.EverySupportingMessagingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingService

    public class EverySupportingMessagingService
extends Object
implements MessagingService
    Implementation that will ask each sender if it is able to handle the message. If the sender can, then the service asks the sender to really send the message. If several senders can handle the message, then each sender that is able to handle it will be used.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
    See Also:
    ConditionalSender

        public EverySupportingMessagingService(ConditionalSender... senders)

      • EverySupportingMessagingService

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(Message message)
          throws MessagingException
        Sends the message. The message can be anything with any content and that must be delivered to something or someone. Ask each sender if it is able to handle the message. Each sender that can't handle the message is skipped. Each sender that is able to handle it will be called in order to really send the message.
        Specified by:
        send in interface MessagingService
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        MessagingException - when the message couldn't be sent
        MessageNotSentException - when no sender could handle the message

      • addSender

        public EverySupportingMessagingService addSender(ConditionalSender sender)
        Register a new sender. The sender is added at the end.
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to register
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining
